pullRequest.title: Refactor doc help
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose

Change doc help file to reflect Project API changes

Check List

 Read the Contributing Guide
 Updated Change Log
 Checked Tooling Support (#)
 Added necessary tests

 Unit Tests
 Spec Conformance Tests
 Integration Tests
 Ballerina By Example Tests


 Increased Test Coverage
 Added necessary documentation

 API documentation
 Module documentation in Module.md files
 Ballerina By Examples

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                   Generate API documentation for a project in a given path.
          
          
            
                   Generate API documentation for a Ballerina package in a given path.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -38,34 +23,9 @@ OPTIONS
        --offline
            Build offline without downloading dependencies.
 
-       -a, --all
-           Build documentation for all the modules of a project.
-
-       -toJSON, --toJSON
-           Generates a JSON containing all the documentation data.
-
-       -fromJSON, --fromJSON
-           Generates documentation from a specified JSON.
-
-       -excludeIndex, --excludeIndex
-           Prevents project index from being generated.
-
-       -templatePath, --templatePath
-           Path to custom template folder.
-
-
 EXAMPLES
-       Generate API documentation for all modules in the current project.
-          $ ballerina doc -a
-
-       Generate API documentation for a single module.
-          $ ballerina doc hello
-
-       Generate a JSON containing all API documentation data.
-          $ ballerina doc -a -toJSON
-
-       Generate API documentation using a JSON.
-          $ ballerina doc -fromJSON target/apidocs/api-doc-data.json
+       Generate API documentation for the current project.
+          $ ballerina doc
 
-       Generate API documentation using a custom templates.
-          $ ballerina doc -a -templatePath ../templates
+       Generate API documentation for a project in a given path.

commit.message:
Refactor doc help

Co-authored-by: Asma Jabir <azinneera@gmail.com>

Refactor doc help

Co-authored-by: Asma Jabir <azinneera@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                   ballerina-doc - Build a Ballerina project's documentation
          
          
            
                   ballerina-doc - Build the documentation of a Ballerina package
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,33 +1,18 @@
 NAME
-       ballerina-doc - Build a Ballerina module's documentation
+       ballerina-doc - Build a Ballerina project's documentation

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                   Doc builds documentation for a given Ballerina project.
          
          
            
                   Doc command builds the documentation for a Ballerina package.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1,33 +1,18 @@
 NAME
-       ballerina-doc - Build a Ballerina module's documentation
+       ballerina-doc - Build a Ballerina project's documentation
 
 SYNOPSIS
-       ballerina doc [<options>] <module-name>
-       ballerina doc -a | --all [<options>]
-       ballerina doc -a | <module-name> -toJSON | --toJSON
-       ballerina doc -fromJSON | --fromJSON [path to json]
+       ballerina doc [<options>]
 
 DESCRIPTION
-       Doc builds documentation for a given module or a ballerina file.
-
-       To build documentation for all modules of the current project,
-       use -a or -all option.
+       Doc builds documentation for a given Ballerina project.
